Title: Provides for a cap on the credit service charge computed and collected on a retail instalment contract
Summary: Provides for a cap on the credit service charge computed and collected on a retail instalment contract.
LawCode: Amd ยง404, Pers Prop L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the personal property law, in relation to providing for a cap on the credit service charge computed and collected on a retail instalment contract
